text: Ernest Ross (27 July 1942 – 17 October 2021) was a British Labour politician. He was the Member of Parliament for Dundee West from 1979 until his retirement at the 2005 general election. He was born in Dundee, Scotland. Ross died on 17 October 2021 in Dundee at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2021 deaths Category:UK MPs 1979–1983 Category:UK MPs 1983–1987 Category:UK MPs 1987–1992 Category:UK MPs 1992–1997 Category:UK MPs 1997–2001 Category:UK MPs 2001–2005 Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs Category:Members of the British House of Commons for Scottish constituencies Category:Politicians from Dundee
title: Ernie Ross
